Articles.Content:
Does intake needs something special in its model? Intake I created shows that air speed is 0 m/s and it won't produce any IntakeAir, my engines die one second after start because of this.

EDIT: and I didn't messed "too much" in cfg file I copied from RamIntake

Edited May 11, 2013 by korda
Check the big, stickied, "Compilation of modding information links" thread.

The intakeTransformName property of the intake module config refers to the object in your model that determines which direction it's pointing (+Z is direction of travel, it can be an empty object), naming an object not on the model is the usual cause of this sort of behaviour on direction-specific modules.
